imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal Oregon white oak leaf + acorn line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-oak.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal Oregon grape flower cluster line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-oregon-grape.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal camas lily bloom line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-camas.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal trillium bloom line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-trillium.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Remove the capacity wording (“up to 8 kids” / “Limited to 8 children”) from the “Program Details” section wherever it appears on the site (including the Little Sprouts page key-details grid and the Home page Little Sprouts details card).

Create a few additional Oregon flower illustration assets in the same calm, minimal botanical style as the existing site decorations, and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Render the newly generated Oregon flower assets in the UI as additional subtle decorative elements (non-interactive, aria-hidden) in an existing decorative area so they are visible in the deployed site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the "up to 8 kids" wording from the Program Details section
Create/add a few more Oregon flower assets (e.g., illustrations/graphics)

projectName: Remove capacity wording from Program Details and add more Oregon flower assets
